text: Thong Auan 'Noi' Tucker (1 December 1960-) is a former Australian international lawn and indoor bowler. She won a silver medal in the triples with Ceri Ann Davies and Roma Dunn at the 2006 Commonwealth Games in Melbourne. Born in Thailand she now lives in Jindalee, Western Australia and won her first Australian cap in 2006. She announced her international retirement in 2007. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Australia Category:Bowls players at the 2006 Commonwealth Games Category:Australian female bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Thai emigrants to Australia Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Australia
title: Noi Tucker
